com.simsilica.ethereal

Class LocalZoneIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.simsilica.ethereal.LocalZoneIndex

  • public class LocalZoneIndex
extends java.lang.Object
    Keeps track of the local zone space around the player to provide smaller zoneId values for particular ZoneKeys. This also serves as a functional limit to what a particular client can see.
